title: Lunar Goddess Diana Chromas Question
body:
So I've read that there are currently 7 chromas for the Lunar Goddess Diana skin (and 8 for skins of Ezreal, Malphite, and Riven) up for testing on the PBE to be released next patch.  Is there a known reason as why there's 7 instead of 8?

Thanks for any response :).

replies.body: Hi! We don't have a set number for each chroma pack - we come up with various color combinations and pick the strongest. If we only feel there are 7 strong options for a particular chroma pack, we'll just go with those 7 and not try to fill up another slot with a mediocre color scheme just to make 8.
Thank you for the response!  Can't wait for these chromas to be released in a couple of weeks :D.

All of the chroma sets come in various types, that's pretty much the only reason.

They come with anywhere between 3 to 10 options.

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VDsSTuLvcHA/V79BD0poc5I/AAAAAAAATjc/GEhwklZ9G4UjXbZCKCNhy1njX9ujjlPdgCLcB/s1600/CHROMA3.jpg

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/chromas
I was wondering the same. Maybe they just thought style-wise only that many color changes looked good
